text: Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 20. I will not sit my head in inhabited areas: a training to be observed.
๒๐. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่โคลงศีรษะนั่งในละแวกบ้าน”
20. I shall not sit fidgetting (shaking, drooping) the head in inhabited areas: this is a training to be done.
